result.title: CodeCracker contest on CodeChef
result.content:
Hello!

I would like to invite you to the Replay of the CodeCracker contest, hosted by the GNU/Linux Users' Group, NIT Durgapur. It's a full ICPC Style contest with 10 questions given in a span of 5 hours.

Please head to http://www.codechef.com/COCR2015/ for the contest

Date: 28th February, 2015

Time: 7pm to 12am (IST)

Duration: 5 hours.
